divs: Sighting DetailsOn the night of April 10th at 10:30 pm I was standing outside in the back yard looking up at the sky when I noticed two objects coming from the south they were side by side and when they were over head the one on the right shifted to the left at a 90 degree angle increased speed then shifted back to the right at a 90 degree angle in front of the other craft it only took around 7 seconds for both craft to go from horizon to horizon and lost sight of it my first thought was this must be a top secret aircraft ufo never entered my mind I was fascinated by what I saw I have never seen anything perform like that I called my wife back in missouri and told her what I had just seen and that it was the wildest thing i had ever seen what really stood out was there was no noise maybe just the slightest sound of a light breeze and the way they performed any information you can give me would be greatly appreciated Thank you for your time.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Foley
There were no other sightings in Foley on or around April 10th 2007
Summary: two objects moving at high rate performing incredible manuevers craft made no sound
